it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view.inet

Interface UserConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockConnectionSender, RMIUserConnection, SocketUserConnection, UserConnectionBase

    public interface UserConnection
    A point-to-point abstract connection between two logical end points. This connection consists of a publisher-subscriber pattern that takes advantage of the Java Reflection: anyone can subscribe to a particular type of message, which is a subclass of UserEvent. The connection acts as a publisher for the opposite endpoint connection.
    See Also:
    for the interface that every type of message exchanged through this connection has to implement.

      void clearSubscribers()
      Removes all the subscribers from this connection, so that events will no longer be notified to anyone.
      void close()
      Closes the connection, freeing all the allocated resources.

      Copies all the subscribers of the given map to the connection subscribers.

      Returns the user associated to the connection.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Starts a new thread that listens to new events. Any new event that will arrive to the object will be notified on all the receivers within that thread.

      • getUser

        User getUser()
        Returns the user associated to the connection.

      • setUser

        void setUser(User user)
        Sets the user associated to the given connection.

      • subscribeEvent

        <T extends UserEvent> void subscribeEvent(java.lang.Class<T> eventClass,
                                          UserEventSubscriber<T> subscriber)
        Subscribes the given subscriber object to this connection so that it will receiver events of the given class.

      • unsubscribeEvent

        <T extends UserEvent> void unsubscribeEvent(java.lang.Class<T> eventClass,
                                            UserEventSubscriber<T> subscriber)
        Removes the subscription of the given object to this connection so that it will no longer receive events of the given class from this connection.

      • clearSubscribers

        void clearSubscribers()
        Removes all the subscribers from this connection, so that events will no longer be notified to anyone.

      • copySubscribers

        void copySubscribers(java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends UserEvent>,java.util.List<UserEventSubscriber>> subscribers)
        Copies all the subscribers of the given map to the connection subscribers.

      • sendEvent

        void sendEvent(UserEvent event)
        Sends the given UserEvent to the other end of the connection.

      • publishEvent

        <T extends UserEvent> void publishEvent(T event)
        Notifies the given event to the appropriate subscribers of this connection.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the connection, freeing all the allocated resources.

      • resetHeartbeat

        void resetHeartbeat()
        Resets the heartbeat count (i.e. a new heartbeat is received and the timer to close the connection has to be reset)
